portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.description: This project is my portfolio. It is a static website built with SvelteKit and Tailwind CSS. On this website, you can find information about me, my projects, and my experiences.

akcelo.title: akcelo.io
akcelo.description: This project is a redesign of the Akcelo's website, an advertising brand of Spacefoot. I was responsible for developing the website's new interface. This rework was done with Svelte. Finally in 2023, I worked on a new page and I migrated the website to Cloudflare.

amt.title: Ardennes Mega Trail (FAQ)
amt.description: This project is a web component for the Ardennes Mega Trail's website. This component is a frequently asked questions section and to build it, I used Svelte and Tailwind CSS. Supabase was used to store the questions and answers. Finally, I dockerized the component to compile all the required files.

leads.title: Akcelo Leads
leads.description: This project is a web application to manage leads. I was responsible for developing the backend, the frontend and to deploy the application. The backend was built with Django and Django REST Framework to provide a REST API. It uses a PostgreSQL database to store the leads and workers to qualify them. The frontend was built with Svelte and Flowbite. To deploy the application, I used Docker locally and Ansible on the server.

footeo.title: Footeo/Clubeo
footeo.description: Footeo/Clubeo is a Content Management System (CMS) for sports clubs that allows them to create and manage their website. I was responsible for developing new features, fixing bugs and working on the website's interface redesign. The application is built with Symfony.

spotify.title: Spotify stats
spotify.description: This personal project is a frontend web application to display Spotify statistics. It uses the Spotify Web API to get the user's data. I built this web application with React, Material-UI and Emotion.

slmads.title: Akcelo internal tools
slmads.description: I'm currently working on internal tools for Akcelo since 2023. The first tool is a web application to manage the company's ads. It is built with Django Admin and I was responsible for developing new features and fixing bugs. The second tool is a frontend web application which allows the diffusion and the placement of ads on our partner's websites. It is built with TypeScript, Vue.js and Prebid.js. I was responsible for developing some modules, testing and fixing bugs.

sportslocalmedia.title: Sports Local Media
sportslocalmedia.description: This project is a static website for Sports Local Media. It is built with SvelteKit and Tailwind CSS. The website is a showcase of the company's services. I used Cloudflare to deploy the website on Cloudflare Pages and to manage emails with Cloudflare Workers and SendGrid.

masteria.title: Master's degree in computer science web app
masteria.description: This project was a school project for my university's master's degree in computer science. It is a web application to manage the master's degree. We built this application with Symfony, Twig and Bootstrap. It was a simple CRUD application to manage students, teachers, courses, etc.
